search.title: List of semiconductor materials
search.snippet: Semiconductor materials are nominally small band gap insulators. The defining property of a semiconductor material is that it can be compromised by doping

search.title: Semiconductor
search.snippet: A semiconductor is a material with electrical conductivity between that of a conductor and an insulator. Its conductivity can be modified by adding impurities

search.title: Applied Materials
search.snippet: Applied Materials, Inc. is an American corporation that supplies equipment, services and software for the manufacture of semiconductor (integrated circuit)
